title: Commander Keen Fan Art (or whatever they call it)
content:
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/5311/keenheadfinalqb0.gif[/img]

I was bored at 12:35 am...... took me about five minutes...

I liked the pixel effect in Commander Keen... so I did the same idea just bigger... the longest part was the checkboard part...

Man I'm hyper..........

EDIT: Won't show the image :-(... is it because it doesn't like PNG..... I Hate GIF/JPEG :-(....

EDIT: Fixed :-D.......

title: Re: Commander Keen Fan Art (or whatever they call it)
content:
Well, that style might look interesting in a mod. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dexter.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Commander Keen Fan Art (or whatever they call it)
content:
I didn't know how to draw a circle without it looking really bad.... and I didn't want to use the circle option :-(......

Man now I want to watch Gumby after hearing the word "blockhead"... "He was just a little green ball of clay..... (insert lyrics that I can't remember).... if you've got a heart than Gumby's a parrrtt of yoou!"

YouTube to teh rescue.........

Went a little off topic there [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] .........

title: Re: Commander Keen Fan Art (or whatever they call it)
content: Also, that solid white line between the yellow and the highlight of the helmet negates the effect of the checkerboarding.

title: Re: Commander Keen Fan Art (or whatever they call it)
content:
I now wonder what a mod would look like if Picasso had drawn the graphics... or Leonardo da Vinci, or Van Gogh, or (insert a name here).

I love checkerboarded graphics, I have drawn many (non Keen related) since 2004. But I agree, that solid white line definitively shouldn't be there.

BTW, is it just me or Keen's face looks too fat in that drawing?[hr][img]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/983/vegetableswk2.gif[/img]

title: Re: Commander Keen Fan Art (or whatever they call it)
content:
I'll get to work.... for you guys......

GROUP HUGGGG! *sings the Barney Song*

I'll take all of that into consideration......

I'm a pro (sort of) in Paint to most people I'm around down where I live......

I'm bad at Facial design so hold your horses while I finished this book I got from the bookstore....

[img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/8415/keenheadfinal20betawh1.gif[/img]

Is it any better? Why does he have a blockhead? Why is his head fat?

STAY TUNED FOR THE SHOCKING FINALE! (Commander Keen 2 joke)

All joking aside..... does he look any better.. I tried to fix as many problems as I could

This might go on a site so I need it looking good......

Please post any ideas, comments, etc. to me.....

EDIT: Well hit me with a stick and run around the yard (said something stupid to stop me from swearing..... I've triple posted.... I am lower that Mr. Sam...... even he doesn't triple post unless he wants too [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-no.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-foot.gif[/img] (with a foot to the boot, and the boot to the head, we'll get up and kill Barney, some song that I hear kids singing)

What is this, an edit with really bad punch lines????????
